name: VSTest
description: Run tests with Visual Studio test runner
author: Microsoft Corporation
releaseNotes:
• Test Impact Analysis: Automatically select and run only the tests needed to validate the code change.
  • Support for minimatch patterns for specifying test assemblies.

inputs.name: testAssemblyVer2
inputs.label: Test Assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run tests from the specified files. The file paths are relative to the search folder. Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns. [More Information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=835764)

inputs.name: searchFolder
inputs.label: Search Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder to search for the test assemblies. Defaults to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).

inputs.name: testFiltercriteria
inputs.label: Test Filter criteria
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional criteria to filter tests from Test assemblies. For example: `Priority=1|Name=MyTestMethod`

inputs.name: runSettingsFile
inputs.label: Run Settings File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to runsettings file to use with the tests. Use `$(Build.SourcesDirectory)` to access the Project folder.

inputs.name: overrideTestrunParameters
inputs.label: Override TestRun Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override parameters defined in the TestRunParameters section of runsettings file. For example: `AppURL=$(DeployURL);Port=8080`

inputs.name: codeCoverageEnabled
inputs.label: Code Coverage Enabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: Collect code coverage information from the Test run.

inputs.name: runInParallel
inputs.label: Run In Parallel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable parallel execution of your tests.

inputs.name: runOnlyImpactedTests
inputs.label: Run Only Impacted Tests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Automatically select, and run only the tests needed to validate the code change.

inputs.name: runAllTestsAfterXBuilds
inputs.label: Number Of Builds After Which To Run All Tests:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of builds after which to automatically run all tests. Test Impact Analysis stores the mapping between test cases and source code. It is recommended to regenerate the mapping by running all tests, on a regular basis.

inputs.name: vsTestVersion
inputs.label: VSTest version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of VSTest to use.

inputs.name: vstestLocation
inputs.label: Path to vstest.console.exe
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to VSTest.

inputs.name: pathtoCustomTestAdapters
inputs.label: Path to Custom Test Adapters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory path to custom test adapters. Nuget restored adapters are automatically searched for.

inputs.name: otherConsoleOptions
inputs.label: Other console options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Other Console options that can be passed to vstest.console.exe. Click on the help link below for more details.

inputs.name: testRunTitle
inputs.label: Test Run Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name for the Test Run.

inputs.name: platform
inputs.label: Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Platform against which the tests should be reported. If you have defined a variable for platform in your build task, use that here.

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configuration against which the tests should be reported. If you have defined a variable for configuration in your build task, use that here.

inputs.name: publishRunAttachments
inputs.label: Upload Test Attachments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Opt in/out of publishing test run level attachments.
